long_description: A top-notch essential for commuting or touring, the waterproof Blackburn Barrier Handlebar Bag keeps gear safe from the elements with tough protection. Multiple interior pockets, a clear top panel for phone or GPS, a stowable shoulder strap and a quick-release mounting system enhance functionality. Offers a magnetic attachment for the Blackburn Barrier Map and Tablet Case (sold separately). Compatible with 25.4 - 31.8mm handlebars.
short_description: A top-notch essential for commuting or touring, the waterproof Blackburn Barrier Handlebar Bag keeps gear safe from the elements with tough protection.
